member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling
member.summary: Contains flags that define the chroma encoding scheme for Y'Cb'Cr' data.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_ProgressiveChroma
member.summary: Chroma should be reconstructed as if the underlying video was progressive content, rather than skipping fields or applying chroma filtering to minimize artifacts from reconstructing 4:2:0 interlaced chroma.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_Horizontally_Cosited
member.summary: Chroma samples are aligned horizontally with the luma samples, or with multiples of the luma samples. If this flag is not set, chroma samples are located 1/2 pixel to the right of the corresponding luma sample.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_Vertically_Cosited
member.summary: Chroma samples are aligned vertically with the luma samples, or with multiples of the luma samples. If this flag is not set, chroma samples are located 1/2 pixel down from the corresponding luma sample.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_Vertically_AlignedChromaPlanes
member.summary: The U and V planes are aligned vertically. If this flag is not set, the chroma planes are assumed to be out of phase by 1/2 chroma sample, alternating between a line of U followed by a line of V.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_MPEG2
member.summary: Specifies the chroma encoding scheme for MPEG-2 video. Chroma samples are aligned horizontally with the luma samples, but are not aligned vertically. The U and V planes are aligned vertically.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_MPEG1
member.summary: Specifies the chroma encoding scheme for MPEG-1 video.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_DV_PAL
member.summary: Specifies the chroma encoding scheme for PAL DV video.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_Cosited
member.summary: Chroma samples are aligned vertically and horizontally with the luma samples. YUV formats such as 4:4:4, 4:2:2, and 4:1:1 are always cosited in both directions and should use this flag.

member.name: MFVideoChromaSubsampling.MFVideoChromaSubsampling_ForceDWORD
member.summary: Reserved. This member forces the enumeration type to compile as a DWORD value.
